page.title: 15 North Hull Estate
page.content: There are four main churches within easy reach and many public houses. There are several shops and most of them are vandalised with writing and have windows broken but the shops are cheap. We are well provided for and there is also a library. We can catch a bus every ten or fifteen minutes if we wish to go into the town centre. I think that it is not a very clean area. People just drop rubbish which leads to nasty smells. This is a shame because North Hull Estate would be very nice otherwise. There are many stray dogs and children often play in the streets. Some gardens are very tidy, with beautiful lawns and lovely flowers. People must spend hours working in them. Other gardens are very untidy with long grass and weeds like dandelions in them.
